channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Barbra Streisand, Dolly Parton, Jimmy Webb and more stars pay tribute to Kris Kristofferson
item.description: Barbra Streisand has called him something special. Jimmy Webb hoped for Godspeed. Melissa Etheridge wrote of his beautiful heart.

item.title: Dikembe Mutombo, a Hall of Fame player and tireless advocate, dies at 58 from brain cancer
item.description: Basketball Hall of Famer Dikembe Mutombo, one of the best defensive players in NBA history and a longtime global ambassador for the game, died Monday from brain cancer, the league announced.

item.title: Man charged with attempting to assassinate Trump will appear in court
item.description: The man accused of attempting to assassinate former President Donald Trump at his Florida golf course is set to appear in court after being indicted on additional charges.
